channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump touts policies aimed at promoting homeownership in Davos speech
item.description: President Trump said his plans for boosting home affordability are already helping, but stopped short of providing details.

item.title: Minneapolis businesses struggle during Trump’s immigration enforcement surge
Immigration officers assert sweeping power to enter homes without a judge’s warrant, memo says
DHS increasing self-deportation stipend from $1,000 to $2,600
item.description: The administration previously offered $1,000 for those who self-deported.

item.title: Court lifts restrictions on immigration officers’ tactics in Minnesota
item.description: An appeals court has suspended a decision that restricts the aggressive tactics of immigration officers in Minnesota.

item.title: Justice Dept. kills cases cracking down on auto emissions cheating
item.description: The Justice Department ordered prosecutors to drop all pending cases targeting the sale of illicit "defeat devices" in diesel-powered vehicles.

item.title: Wealth inequality in America just hit its widest gap in three decades.
item.description: Nearly one-third of U.S. household wealth was held by the top 1% in the third quarter of 2025.

item.title: DHS launches 'Operation Catch of the Day' enforcement action in Maine
item.description: The Department of Homeland Security has launched an operation targeting criminal illegal migrants in the state of Maine, according to a DHS spokespers...

item.title: WATCH: South braces for potentially major winter snow and ice storm this weekend
item.description: The South is bracing for a potentially major winter storm this weekend, impacting Texas, Oklahoma, Louisiana, Arkansas, Mississippi, Alabama and Tenne...

item.title: Trump announces 'framework' for a future deal on Greenland, drops NATO tariff threat
item.description: President Trump said he is standing down on his NATO tariff threat over Greenland, citing a "framework of a future deal" on the Danish territory.

item.title: Concerns mount over Reza Valizadeh, Iranian-American journalist wrongfully detained in Iran
item.description: Reza Valizadeh, a 49-year-old dual U.S.-Iranian citizen and longtime critic of Iran, was arrested in September 2024 by the Islamic Revolutionary Guard...

item.title: WATCH: Stunning view of northern lights seen from International Space Station
item.description: Cosmonaut Sergey Kud-Sverchkov shared a dazzling view of the northern lights as seen this week from the International Space Station.

item.title: Wacky jobs: Doggy treat tasters
item.description: "Sunday Morning" takes a look at a few occupations where employees' jobs are far from ordinary. Susan Spencer gets a peak inside the taste test crew a...
